@graph.name: Bulk Discount Code Generator For Shopify
@graph.description: Generate unique discount codes in bulk for Shopify stores. Perfect for marketing campaigns, app integrations like Upviral, and bulk importing discount codes.
@graph.browserRequirements: Modern web browser with JavaScript enabled
featureList: Generate unique discount codes in bulk

audience.audienceType: Shopify Store Owners, E-commerce Marketers, Campaign Managers

@graph.name: How To Use The Discount Generator Tool
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to generate bulk discount codes for Shopify

step.name: Configure Code Settings
step.text: Add your details including optional prefix, number of codes to generate, and desired code length

step.name: Generate Codes
step.text: Click the Generate Codes button to create unique discount codes

step.name: Export Results
step.text: Download the generated codes as a CSV file for easy import into Shopify or other platforms

mainEntity.name: What is the bulk discount code generator used for?

acceptedAnswer.text: The tool generates unique discount codes in bulk for Shopify stores, perfect for marketing campaigns and integration with tools like Upviral.

mainEntity.name: Can I customize the discount codes?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can add a custom prefix, set the code length, and specify how many codes to generate.

mainEntity.name: How do I export the generated codes?

acceptedAnswer.text: Click the Download CSV button to export all generated codes as a CSV file for easy import into Shopify or other platforms.

@graph.name: Bulk Discount Code Generator For Shopify
@graph.description: Generate unique discount codes in bulk for Shopify stores and marketing campaigns

hasDefinedTerm.name: Bulk Generation
hasDefinedTerm.description: Creating multiple unique discount codes simultaneously for efficient campaign management

hasDefinedTerm.name: Code Prefix
hasDefinedTerm.description: Custom text added to the beginning of each generated discount code for branding or organization

hasDefinedTerm.name: CSV Export
hasDefinedTerm.description: Downloading generated codes in comma-separated values format for easy import into other systems

@graph.name: Use Cases for Bulk Discount Code Generator

itemListElement.name: Upviral Campaign Integration
itemListElement.description: Generate unique codes for viral marketing campaigns where users receive discount codes for sharing

itemListElement.name: Email Marketing Campaigns
itemListElement.description: Create personalized discount codes for email subscribers and marketing automation

itemListElement.name: Social Media Promotions
itemListElement.description: Generate codes for social media contests and promotional campaigns

itemListElement.name: Influencer Partnerships
itemListElement.description: Create unique tracking codes for influencer collaborations and affiliate programs
